full_summary:
# Administration of the CAF Relocation Program
## Mandatory Information

### Tender Announcement Details

* **Reference Number**: WS4220255020-Doc4596630011
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4220255020
* **Publication Date**: 2024-05-21
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-05-27T14:00:00
* **Status**: Expired

### Contract Informations

* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2024-11-29
* **Contract Category**: SRV
* **Tender Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

### Trade Agreements and Regions

* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: None
* **Regions of Delivery**: Canada

### Contracting Entity and End-User Entities

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
  * Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
* **End-User Entities**: Department of National Defence (DND)
  * Address: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K2, Canada

### Contact Information

* **Contact Person**: Dominic Carriére (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Contact Email**: dominic.carriere@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Contact Information for Technical Support**: CanadaBuys Service Desk agents (https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/contact-support)

### Tender Description

Please note that to access feedback, you must be logged in to your SAP Ariba account and have completed your Government of Canada profile. For technical support, please consult [the CanadaBuys Getting Started page](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/getting-started). Alternatively, you may contact the CanadaBuys Service Desk agents at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/fr/obtenir-de-laide](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/fr/obtenir-de-laide).
